description: ICS techniques mitigated by Password Policies, ATT&CK mitigation M0927 (v1.0)
name: Password Policies (M0927)

techniques.comment: Applications and appliances that utilize default username and password should be changed immediately after the installation, and before deployment to a production environment.(Citation: CISA June 2013)
Review vendor documents and security alerts for potentially unknown or overlooked default credentials within existing devices
Set and enforce secure password policies for accounts.
Enforce strong password requirements to prevent password brute force methods for lateral movement.

Applications and appliances that utilize default username and password should be changed immediately after the installation, and before deployment to a production environment. (Citation: CISA June 2013)
